trans-unit.source: A configuration element that controls the discovery functionality of an endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 一个用于控制终结点的发现功能的配置元素。

trans-unit.source: When added to endpoint’s behavior configuration, the EndpointDiscoveryElement element allows the discovery functionality of the endpoint to be enabled or disabled.
trans-unit.target: 添加到终结点的行为配置时，EndpointDiscoveryElement 元素将允许要启用或禁用的终结点的发现功能。

trans-unit.source: Additionally it allows specifying custom scope URIs that can be used to filter service endpoints during discovery operations.
trans-unit.target: 此外，它允许指定自定义范围可以用于在发现操作过程中筛选服务终结点的 Uri。

trans-unit.source: It also allows specifying custom XML metadata that is published along with the standard discoverable metadata.
trans-unit.target: 它还允许指定随标准可发现元数据一起发布的自定义 XML 元数据。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The EndpointDiscoveryElement is dependent on the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.Configuration.ServiceDiscoveryElement> that provides service level control of discoverability.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> EndpointDiscoveryElement 是依赖于<xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.Configuration.ServiceDiscoveryElement>提供服务级别控制可发现性。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.Configuration.ServiceDiscoveryElement>

trans-unit.source: This means that the EndpointDiscoveryElement and its settings are ignored if a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.Configuration.ServiceDiscoveryElement> element is not present.
trans-unit.target: 这意味着如果忽略 EndpointDiscoveryElement 和其设置<xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.Configuration.ServiceDiscoveryElement>元素不存在。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.Configuration.ServiceDiscoveryElement>

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the EndpointDiscoveryElement element and add two scope elements.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用 EndpointDiscoveryElement 元素并添加两个作用域元素。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.Configuration.EndpointDiscoveryElement"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 创建的新实例<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.Configuration.EndpointDiscoveryElement"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Gets the behavior type associated with the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.Configuration.EndpointDiscoveryElement"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取与关联的行为类型<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.Configuration.EndpointDiscoveryElement"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The behavior type.
trans-unit.target: 行为类型。

trans-unit.source: Gets the contract type names associated with the endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 获取与终结点关联的协定类型名称。

trans-unit.source: The contract type names associated with the endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 与终结点关联的协定类型名称。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates the discoverability of this endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示此终结点的可发现性。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the discoverability of this endpoint is enabled, otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果启用了此终结点的可发现性，否则<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the extensions associated with the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.Configuration.EndpointDiscoveryElement"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取与关联的扩展<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.Configuration.EndpointDiscoveryElement"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The extensions.
trans-unit.target: 扩展。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of scopes for this endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 获取此终结点的作用域的集合。

trans-unit.source: A scope is any URI that can be used to group services into logical groups.
trans-unit.target: 范围是可用于组服务中进行逻辑分组的任何 URI。

trans-unit.source: A collection of scopes associated with this endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 与此终结点关联的作用域集合。
